description: A crisp, golden cannoli shell filled with rich, creamy ricotta filling.
ingredients: [{"name": "all-purpose flour", "units": "cups", "amount": 2}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "tbsp", "amount": 2}, {"name": "cinnamon", "units": "tsp", "amount": 1}, {"name": "salt", "units": "tsp", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "unsalted butter", "units": "tbsp", "amount": 3}, {"name": "egg", "units": null, "amount": 1}, {"name": "sweet Marsala wine", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "vinegar", "units": "tbsp", "amount": 1}, {"name": "water", "units": "as needed", "amount": null}, {"name": "vegetable oil", "units": "for frying", "amount": null}, {"name": "whole milk ricotta cheese", "units": "cups", "amount": 2}, {"name": "powdered sugar", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.75}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "tsp", "amount": 1}, {"name": "cinnamon", "units": "tsp", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "mini chocolate chips", "units": "cup", "amount": 0.3333333333333333}, {"name": "chopped pistachios", "units": "optional", "amount": null}, {"name": "additional chocolate chips", "units": "optional", "amount": null}, {"name": "candied orange peel", "units": "optional", "amount": null}]
instructions: Step 1: Make the Dough. In a large bowl, mix flour, sugar, cinnamon, and salt. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Add the egg, Marsala wine, vinegar, and water, mixing until a dough forms. Knead gently on a floured surface until smooth. Wrap the dough in plastic and refrigerate for at least 1 hour. Step 2: Prepare the Filling. In a medium bowl, combine ricotta, powdered sugar, vanilla, and cinnamon. Fold in the mini chocolate chips. Cover and refrigerate until ready to fill the shells. Step 3: Roll and Fry the Shells. Roll out the dough very thin on a floured surface. Cut out circles. Wrap each circle around a metal cannoli form, sealing the edge with water. Heat vegetable oil to 350°F. Fry shells until golden brown and crisp. Drain on paper towels. Let cool before removing from forms. Step 4: Fill the Cannoli. Use a piping bag or spoon to fill each shell with the ricotta mixture just before serving. Garnish as desired and dust with powdered sugar.
notes: Cannoli may be a sweet indulgence, but it’s all about balance.
